channel.title: Windows on Fieryrival's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on Fieryrival's Blog

item.title: Building a Shell: From Malicious .NET Project to 'FullPowers'
item.description: Medium rated Windows box from hackthebox that involves building a malicious .NET solution project for foothold, and exploiting ‘FullPowers’ via SeImpersonate for privilege escalation.

item.title: Becoming the Authority: An AD CS Exploit on HTB 'Authority'
item.description: Walkthrough of a medium-rated Windows AD box involving LDAP manipulation, cracking an Ansible vault, and escalating to Domain Admin via the AD CS ESC1 exploit.

item.title: From GPP to Domain Admin: Cracking HTB 'Active'
item.description: Easy rated windows AD box from hackthebox comprising GPP and kerberoasting.
